item.title: Brain
item.description: Brain Anatomy MRI I have animated my brain anatomy from MRI data. There are a few parts I was unable to segment so for any one with knowledge of brain anatomy please donâ€™t diagnose me for any missing tissue quite yet.

item.title: Olivine Phenocryst
item.description: Olivine crystal from 1932 eruption of Quizapu Volcano in Chile. These images were produced using x-ray computed tomography to demonstrate the three dimensional structure and inclusions of volcanic crystals the size of sand grains. Volcanologists use these crystals to study magma movement prior to eruptions. The crystals and magma glass trapped inside them, known as melt inclusions, offer windows into the magma’s chemical history. The crystal’s chemistry teaches us about the temperature of the magma when it grew.
